intro.sw: $greeting #firstname# na karibu tena. Leo ungependa nikusaidiaje?

intro_error.en: I'm sorry #firstname#, I can only help with  at the moment. Please choose one.
intro_error.sw: Samahani #firstname#, ninaweza kukusaidia na . Tafadhali chagua moja.

reset_conversation.en: Previous conversation has been cleared, you can now start afresh.
reset_conversation.sw: Majadiliano ya awali umefutiliwa, sasa unaweza kwanza upya.

index_outof_range.en: Sorry #firstname#, the option you selected does not exist. You can only choose  from these options:
index_outof_range.sw: Samahani #firstname#, chaguo lako halikupatikana. Tafadhali chagua moja kati ya:

en: Please choose your preferred option from these:
Select any of the options below that interests you:
Which of these options interest you?
sw: Ni chaguo gani kati ya haya inayokuvutia?

en: Thank you #firstname#, you can continue with any of the options below.
sw: Asante #firstname#, unaweza endelea kutumia huduma hii kwa kuchagua kati ya haya.

unavailable_content.en: Unfortunately, the content you're trying to access is not available. Please check back later.
unavailable_content.sw: Kwa bahati mbaya, maudhui unayojaribu kufikia hayapatikani. Tafadhali angalia tena baadaye.

error_message.en: Sorry, we are currently experiencing technical issues. Please check back later.
error_message.sw: Samahani, kwa sasa tunakumbana na matatizo ya kiufundi. Tafadhali angalia tena baadaye.

selectedoption_error.en: Sorry , the option you selected does not exist. You can only choose from these options:
selectedoption_error.sw: Samahani , chaguo ulilochagua halipo. Unaweza tu kuchagua kutoka kwa chaguzi hizi:
